languages.text: "Под властью почтенной Инцендии Футфол идет к очищению и процветанию. Но бремя грехов его все еще тяжело и не избыто".

traits.locale_text: "Под властью почтенной Инцендии Футфол идет к очищению и процветанию. Но бремя грехов его все еще тяжело и не избыто".

languages.text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."
languages.original_text: "Под властью почтенной Инцендии Футфол идет к очищению и процветанию. Но бремя грехов его все еще тяжело и не избыто".

traits.locale_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of sin persists still, and it is a heavy one."
"Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of sin persists still, and it is a heavy one."
"Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of sin persists still, and it is a heavy one."
"Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of sin persists still, and it is a heavy one."
"Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

languages.text: 「栄えあるインセンディアの支配を受け、フットフォールは浄化と繁栄に向かいます。ですが堕落行為の責任は、まだ残っております。実に重い責任です」
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: 「栄えあるインセンディアの支配を受け、フットフォールは浄化と繁栄に向かいます。ですが堕落行為の責任は、まだ残っております。実に重い責任です」

languages.text: “在尊贵的因森蒂娅的统治下，落脚港正在不断净化，逐渐恢复昔日的繁荣。不过，它的堕落仍然沉疴难愈。”
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: “在尊贵的因森蒂娅的统治下，落脚港正在不断净化，逐渐恢复昔日的繁荣。不过，它的堕落仍然沉疴难愈。”

languages.text: «Bajo el gobierno de la estimada Incendia, Paso va camino de la purga y la prosperidad. Pero el peso de la depravación aún se hace notar y es más que considerable».
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: «Bajo el gobierno de la estimada Incendia, Paso va camino de la purga y la prosperidad. Pero el peso de la depravación aún se hace notar y es más que considerable».

languages.text: « Sous le règne de l'honorable Incendia, Castel retrouvera sa pureté et sa prospérité. Mais le chemin est encore long, car la station était dans un état de dépravation avancé. »
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: « Sous le règne de l'honorable Incendia, Castel retrouvera sa pureté et sa prospérité. Mais le chemin est encore long, car la station était dans un état de dépravation avancé. »

languages.text: "Unter der Herrschaft der geschätzten Incendia ist Footfall auf dem Weg zu Reinheit und Wohlstand. Aber noch besteht die Bürde der Schandtaten, und sie wiegt schwer."
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: "Unter der Herrschaft der geschätzten Incendia ist Footfall auf dem Weg zu Reinheit und Wohlstand. Aber noch besteht die Bürde der Schandtaten, und sie wiegt schwer."

languages.text: "Binliman, muhterem İncendia'nın yönetiminde arınma ve refaha doğru yol alsa da fesatlık varlığını sürdürüyor ve bu, ağır bir yük."
languages.original_text: "Under the esteemed Incendia's rule, Footfall is headed for purgation and prosperity. But its burden of depravity persists still, and it is a heavy one."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman, muhterem İncendia'nın yönetiminde arınma ve refaha doğru yol alıyor ama fesatlık hâlâ devam ediyor ve bu, ağır bir yük."
